text: VISION AND OBJECTIVESINTRODUCTION 9.5 We will identify and coordinate the provision of infrastructure necessary to support our growing population, including promoting the delivery of new parks, public transport improvements, educational, health, community, cultural, and recreational facilities across the borough. 9.6 Our unique town centres, markets, historical, and cultural attractions will be revitalised to support local communities and become some of London’s top attractions. With the borough’s growing Tower Hamlets Local Plan 33 INTRODUCTIONVISION AND OBJECTIVES BACK TO CONTENTS population, young people will be at the forefront of anticipated regeneration with jobs, homes, spaces, and environments geared towards their success.
